anya-e0809n2:3_0: Vaggā bhūmi, purī, macca, catubbaṇṇa, vanādihi;
anya-e0809n2:6_0: Vasundharā chamā bhūmi, pathavī medanī mahī;
anya-e0809n2:7_0: Ubbī vasumatī go ku, vasudhā dharaṇī dharā;
anya-e0809n2:8_0: Puthavī jagatī bhūrī, bhū ca bhūtadharā’ vanī.
anya-e0809n2:10_0: Khārā tu mattikā ūso, ūsavā tūsaro tisu;
anya-e0809n2:16_0: Pumbahutte kurū sakkā, kosalā magadhā sivī;
anya-e0809n2:19_0: Vaṅgā videhā kambojā, maddā bhagga’ṅga sīhaḷā;
anya-e0809n2:22_0: Loko ca bhuvanaṁ vuttaṁ, deso tu visayo pyatha;
anya-e0809n2:26_0: Saddalo harite dese, tiṇenā, bhinavena hi.
anya-e0809n2:33_0: Raṭṭhaṁ tu vijitañcātha, purise setu āliyaṁ.
anya-e0809n2:35_0: Upāntabhū parisaro, goṭṭhaṁ tu gokulaṁ vajo;
anya-e0809n2:36_0: Maggo pantho patho addhā, añjasaṁ vaṭumaṁ tathā.
anya-e0809n2:38_0: Pajjo pajjā…. (ka.), yanañca padavī, vattanī paddhatitthiyaṁ;
anya-e0809n2:39_0: Tabbhedā jaṅgha, sakaṭa, maggā te ca mahaddhani.
anya-e0809n2:44_0: Suppatho tu supantho ca, uppathaṁ tvapathaṁ bhave.
anya-e0809n2:46_0: Chattiṁsaparamāṇūna, meko ṇu ca chattiṁsa te;
anya-e0809n2:47_0: Tajjārī tāpi chattiṁsa, rathareṇu chattiṁsa te.
anya-e0809n2:49_0: Likkhātā satta ūkā tā, dhaññamāsoti satta te;
anya-e0809n2:50_0: Satta ṅgula’ mamu dviccha, vidatthi tā duve siyuṁ.
anya-e0809n2:52_0: Ratanaṁ tāni satteva, yaṭṭhi tā vīsatū sabhaṁ;
